content: this rag doll style crochet doll is so fun to make and best part it requires no sewing sizes one size skill level beginner terminology this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms in english only materials - size f or 3 75mm crochet hook - size g or 4 0mm crochet hook - size h or 5 0mm crochet hook - worsted weight yarn in your skin tone color hair color white for the under dress dress color and accessories color i will be using we crochet brava yarn in the colors avacado rouge seraphim and almond - tapestry needle - scissors - polyfill - nylon headband - black embroidery thread - lip color embroidery thread or fingering weight yarn - stitch marker - 3 rubber bands
